About Me

I am a QA Engineer from St. Petersburg, what languages and technologies I use in my work: Docker, LXC/LXC, Python, Pytest, Typescript, CodeceptJS, GitLab CI, Powershell, VMware, Hyper-V, KVM Worked at Kaspersky - used Azure DevOps, Python, Twisted. In this blog I will share my accumulated knowledge and experience in testing, as well as publish already known articles with translation into Russian
